title: LibGuides: COVID-19 Resources for Patients and Families: COVID-19 Vaccines & Health Conditions
author: Vesna Silobad
description: LibGuides: COVID-19 Resources for Patients and Families: COVID-19 Vaccines & Health Conditions
cleaned_text: For information on how a COVID-19 infection affects transplant patients, go to: [COVID-19 and Transplants](https://guides.hsict.library.utoronto.ca/c.php?g=716817&p=5119689) For information on how a COVID-19 infection affects people with cancer, go to: [COVID-19 and Cancer](https://guides.hsict.library.utoronto.ca/c.php?g=716817&p=5112722) For information on how a COVID-19 infection affects people living with diabetes, go to: [COVID-19 and Diabetes](https://guides.hsict.library.utoronto.ca/c.php?g=716817&p=5112723) For information on how a COVID-19 infection affects people living with liver disease, go to: [COVID-19 and Liver Disease](https://guides.hsict.library.utoronto.ca/c.php?g=716817&p=5112731#s-lg-box-wrapper-18987955) For information on how a COVID-19 infection affects people living with Multiple Sclerosis, go to: [COVID-19 and Multiple Sclerosis](https://guides.hsict.library.utoronto.ca/c.php?g=716817&p=5112727) For information on how a COVID-19 infection affects arthritis, go to: [COVID-19 and Arthritis ](https://guides.hsict.library.utoronto.ca/c.php?g=716817&p=5112731#s-lg-box-wrapper-19248610) For information on how a COVID-19 infection affects pregnancy, go to: [COVID-19 and Pregnancy](https://guides.hsict.library.utoronto.ca/c.php?g=716817&p=5112731#s-lg-box-wrapper-19176729) UHN Patient & Family Learning Centres - For information and feedback about this web site, contact us by e-mail [tgpen@uhn.ca](mailto:tgpen@uhn.ca) | [Privacy Policy](https://guides.hsict.library.utoronto.ca/covid19patientlibrary/privacy-policy?preview=ae5c8d370033d7b1cb16ce34e1293892) | [Disclaimer](https://guides.hsict.library.utoronto.ca/covid19patientlibrary/disclaimer?preview=ae5c8d370033d7b1cb16ce34e1293892) Copyright © - University Health Network.
